titles.title: O God You are my God (Psalm 63)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Oh God, You are my God,
I seek for You in the morning.
My soul, it thirsts for You,
I long for You in the weary land.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For I have seen You in the holy place,
Beheld Your power and Your glory.
Because Your love is more than life to me,
My lips will praise Your name forever,
As long as I live.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
My soul, is satisfied,
And in Your name I will lift my hands.
My mouth, will give You praise,
I sing beneath the shadow of Your wings.
